jobs.title: Senior Electrical Engineer
jobs.description: We are looking for an experienced Senior Electrical Engineer to lead design and implementation of transmission & distribution projects. The role involves project management, technical oversight, and client coordination.
requirements: B.Tech/BE in Electrical Engineering with 5+ years experience
Experience with T&D projects and systems
Knowledge of relevant codes and standards
responsibilities: Design and implement electrical systems for T&D projects
Coordinate with project teams and clients
Ensure compliance with electrical codes and standards

jobs.title: System Integration Specialist
jobs.description: Responsible for integrating electrical and utility systems across multiple platforms. The role requires both technical expertise and project management skills to ensure seamless operations.
requirements: B.Tech/BE in Electrical/Electronics Engineering with 3+ years experience
responsibilities: Plan and execute system integration projects

jobs.title: Field Service Engineer
jobs.description: Field engineers are responsible for installation, commissioning, and maintenance of electrical equipment at client sites. The role requires travel across India and technical expertise.
responsibilities: Installation and commissioning of electrical equipment
Provide technical support at client sites

jobs.title: Safety Compliance Officer
jobs.description: Ensure compliance with electrical safety regulations and standards across all projects. The role involves conducting safety audits, training, and developing safety protocols.
requirements: B.Tech/BE in Electrical Engineering with 3+ years experience
Knowledge of safety standards and regulations
Strong attention to detail and documentation skills
